history.heading: “Software” not specified by 3D992.a designed or modified to perform all of the following in or with deep-ultraviolet immersion photolithography equipment:
history.title: “Software” not specified by 3D992.a designed or modified to perform all of the following in or with deep-ultraviolet immersion photolithography equipment:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: 3D992 “Software” for the “development” or “production” of commodities specified in 3B001.a.4, c, d, f.1, f.5, f.6, k to n, p.2, p.4, r, or 3B002.c and “software” as follows (see List of Items Controlled).
history.text:
“Software” not specified by 3D992.a designed or modified to perform all of the following in or with deep-ultraviolet immersion photolithography equipment:
Decrease the minimum resolvable feature specified by 3B001.f.1.b; and
c.1. Decrease the minimum resolvable feature specified by 3B001.f.1.b; and
Decrease the maximum 'dedicated chuck overlay' of deep-ultraviolet immersion lithography equipment below or equal to 1.5 nm.
c.2. Decrease the maximum 'dedicated chuck overlay' of deep-ultraviolet immersion lithography equipment below or equal to 1.5 nm.
